title: League of legends can not even open
body:
When i start to open the new client, it takes a while then didn't open or show the league of legends  name 

then what should i do to open it ?!  please Help me on that is issue 
(Notice) the new client  league of legends  total size is (524 KB) 
Please.. help me 
i'm using  (Win)

replies.body: If this started happening recently after a patch, you might just need to update your permissions to make sure League is still able to run all of its game files. Hit up our [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) if you need some help with getting that done!
